content: Buddha's Left Hand is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Left_Hand.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Left Hand'.
The content is as follows:
Buddha's Left Hand is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
